events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle rear-ending another car on Main Street.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the involved keywords and damage described.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to assist the customer with the auto accident claim and guide through the process.
The claim acknowledgement notification was sent to the customer confirming receipt of their auto accident report.
The claims team requested the police report, vehicle repair estimate, and photos from the accident scene for investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report and repair estimates within the expected timeframe.
The investigation into the auto accident claim began to verify the details and assess liability and damages.
Investigation was completed identifying fault and confirming validity of the repair costs submitted by the customer.
Based on findings, a fair settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs and rental vehicle fees.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the claims process.
The claim was formally approved by the insurer after confirmation of the customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment was issued promptly to the customer as per the approved settlement for the auto accident damages.
The claim was closed successfully after all payments were processed and customer feedback was recorded.
The documentation and records of the auto accident claim were archived according to company policy for future reference.
